item.title: בּגוד
item.description: From H898; treacherous: - treacherous.

item.title: בּגוי
item.description:
Probably of foreign origin;
{Bigvai} an Israelite: - Bigvai.

item.title: בּגתא
item.description:
Of Persian derivation;
{Bigtha} a eunuch of Xerxes: - Bigtha.

item.title: בּגתנא בּגתן
item.description: Of similar derivation to H903; Bigthan or {Bigthana} a eunuch of Xerxes: - {Bigthan} Bigthana.

item.title: בּד
item.description:
From H909; properly separation; by implication a part of the {body} branch of a {tree} bar for carrying; figuratively chief of a city; especially (with prepositional prefix) as {adverb} apart6
{only} besides: - {alone} {apart} {bar} {besides} {branch} by {self} of each {alike} {except} {only} {part} {staff} strength.

item.title: בּד
item.description: Perhaps from H909 (in the sense of divided fibres); flaxen thread or yarn; hence a linen garment: - linen.

item.title: בּד
item.description: From H908; a brag or lie; also a liar: - {liar} lie.

item.title: בּדא
item.description: A primitive root; (figuratively) to invent: - {devise} feign.

item.title: בּדד
item.description: A primitive root; to {divide} that {is} (reflexively) be solitary: - alone.

item.title: בּדד
item.description: From H909; separate; adverbially separately: - {alone} {desolate} {only} solitary.

item.title: בּדד
item.description:
From H909; separation;
{Bedad} an Edomite: - Bedad.

item.title: בּדיה
item.description:
Probably shortened for H5662; servant of Jehovah;
{Bedejah} an Israelite: - Bedeiah.

item.title: בּדיל
item.description: From H914; alloy (because removed by smelting); by analogy tin: - + {plummet} tin.

item.title: בּדל
item.description:
A primitive root; to divide (in various senses literally or {figuratively} separate6
{distinguish} differ6
{select} etc.): - ({make} put) {difference} divide ({asunder}) (make) separate ({self} {-ation}) sever ({out}) X utterly.

item.title: בּדל
item.description: From H914; a part: - piece.

item.title: בּדלח
item.description: Probably from H914; something in {pieces} that {is} {bdellium} a (fragrant) gum (perhaps amber); others a pearl: - bdellium.

item.title: בּדן
item.description:
Probably shortened for H5658; servile;
{Bedan} the name of two Israelite: - Bedan.

item.title: בּדק
item.description: A primitive root; to gap open; used only as a denominative from H919; to mend a breach: - repair.

item.title: בּדק
item.description: From H918; a gap or leak (in a building or a ship): - {breach} + calker.

item.title: בּדקר
בּדר
item.description: (Chaldee); corresponding (by transposition) to H6504: to scatter: - scatter.

item.title: בּהוּ
item.description: From an unused root (meaning to be empty); a {vacuity} that {is} (superficially) an undistinguishable ruin: - {emptiness} void.

item.title: בּהט
item.description: From an unused root (probably meaning to glisten); white marble or perhaps alabaster: - red [marble].

item.title: בּהילוּ
item.description: (Chaldee); from H927; a hurry; only adverbially hastily: - in haste.

item.title: בּהיר
item.description: From an unused root (meaning to be bright); shining: - bright.

item.title: בּהל
item.description: A primitive root; to tremble inwardly (or {palpitate}) that {is} (figuratively) be (causatively make) (suddenly) alarmed or agitated; by implication to hasten anxiously: - be (make) affrighted ({afraid} {amazed} {dismayed} {rash}) ({be} {get} make) haste ({-n} {-y} {-ily}) (give) speedy ({-ily}) thrust {out} {trouble} vex.

item.title: בּהל
item.description: (Chaldee); corresponding to H926; to {terrify} hasten: - in {haste} trouble.

item.title: בּהלה
item.description: From H926; {panic} destruction: - {terror} trouble.

item.title: בּהמה
item.description: From an unused root (probably meaning to be mute); properly a dumb beast; especially any large quadruped or animal (often collectively): - {beast} cattle.

item.title: בּהמות
item.description: In form a plural of {H929} but really a singular of Egyptian derivation: a water {ox} that {is} the hippopotamus or Nile horse: - Behemoth.

item.title: בּהן
item.description: From an unused root apparently meaning to be thick; the thumb of the hand or great toe of the foot: - {thumb} great toe.

item.title: בּהן
item.description:
An orthographical variation of H931; thumb;
{Bohan} an Israelite: - Bohan.

item.title: בּהק
item.description: From an unused root meaning to be pale; white scurf: - freckled spot.

item.title: בּהרת
item.description: Feminine active participle of the same as H925; a whitish spot on the skin: - bright spot.

item.title: בּוא
item.description: A primitive root; to go or come (in a wide variety of applications): - {abide} {apply} {attain} X {be} {befall} + {besiege} bring ({forth} {in} {into} to {pass}) {call} {carry} X {certainly} ({cause} {let} thing for) to come ({against} {in} {out} {upon} to {pass}) {depart} X doubtless {again} + {eat} + {employ} (cause to) enter ({in} {into} {-tering} {-trance} {-try}) be {fallen} {fetch} + {follow} {get} {give} go ({down} {in} to {war}) {grant} + {have} X {indeed} {[in-]vade} {lead} lift {[up]} {mention} pull {in} {put} {resort} run ({down}) {send} {set} X (well) stricken [in {age]} X {surely} take ({in}) way.

item.title: בּוּז
item.description: A primitive root; to disrespect: - {contemn} {despise} X utterly.

item.title: בּוּז
item.description: From H936; disrespect: - contempt ({-uously}) {despised} shamed.

item.title: בּוּז
item.description: The same as H937; {Buz} the name of a son of {Nahor} and of an Israelite: - Buz.

item.title: בּוּזה
item.description: Feminine passive participle of H936; something scorned; an object of contempt: - despised.

item.title: בּוּזי
item.description: Patronymic from H938; a Buzite or descendant of Buz: - Buzite.

item.title: בּוּזי
item.description: The same as {H940} {Buzi} an Israelite: - Buzi.

item.title: בּוּי
item.description:
Probably of Persian origin;
{Bavvai} an Israelite: - Bavai.

item.title: בּוּך
item.description: A primitive root; to involve (literally or figuratively): - be entangled (perplexed).

item.title: בּוּל
item.description: For H2981; produce (of the {earth} etc.): - {food} stock.

item.title: בּוּל
item.description:
The same as H944 (in the sense of rain);
{Bul} the eight Hebrew month: - Bul.

item.title: בּוּנה
item.description:
From H995; discretion;
{Bunah} an Israelite: - Bunah.

item.title: בּוּס
item.description: A primitive root; to trample (literally or figuratively): - {loath} tread ({down} under {[foot]}) be polluted.

item.title: בּוּץ
item.description: From an unused root (of the same form) meaning to {bleach} that {is} (intransitively) be white; probably cotton (of some sort): - fine (white) linen.

item.title: בּוצץ
item.description:
From the same as H948; shining;
{Botsets} a rock near Michmash: - Bozez.

item.title: בּוּקה
item.description:
Feminine passive participle of an unused root (meaning to be hollow);
emptiness (as adjective): - empty.

item.title: בּוקר
item.description: Properly active participle from H1239 as denominative from H1241; a cattletender: - herdman.

item.title: בּוּר
item.description: A primitive root; to {bore} that {is} (figuratively) examine: - declare.

item.title: בּור
item.description: From H952 (in the sense of H877); a pit hole (especially one used as a cistern or prison): - {cistern} {dungeon} {fountain} {pit} well.

item.title: בּוּשׁ
item.description: A primitive root; properly to {pale} that {is} by implication to be ashamed; also (by implication) to be {disappointed} or delayed: - ({be} {make} bring {to} {cause} put {to} {with} a-) shame ({-d}) be (put to) confounded ({-fusion}) become {dry} {delay} be long.

item.title: בּוּשׁה
item.description: Feminine participle passive of H954; shame: - shame.

item.title: בּוּת
item.description: (Chaldee); apparently denominative from H1005; to lodge over night: - pass the night.

item.title: בּז
item.description: From H962; plunder: - {booty} {prey} spoil (-ed).

item.title: בּזא
item.description: A primitive root; probably to cleave: - spoil.

item.title: בּזה
item.description: A primitive root; to disesteem: - {despise} {disdain} contemn ({-ptible}) + think to {scorn} vile person.

item.title: בּזה
item.description: From H959; scorned: - despise.

item.title: בּזּה
item.description: Feminine of H957; booty: - {prey} spoil.

item.title: בּזז
item.description: A primitive root; to plunder: - {catch} {gather} (take) for a {prey} rob ({-ber}) {spoil} take ({away} {spoil}) X utterly.

item.title: בּזּיון
item.description: From H959; disesteem: - disesteem: - contempt.

item.title: בּזיותיה
item.description:
From H959 and H3050; contempts of Jah;
{Bizjothjah} a place in Palestine: - Bizjothjah.

item.title: בּזק
item.description: From an unused root meaning to lighten; a flash of lighting: - flash of lightning.

item.title: בּזק
item.description:
From H965; lightning;
{Bezek} a place in Palestine: - Bezek.

item.title: בּזר
item.description: A primitive root; to disperse: - scatter.

item.title: בּזתא
item.description:
Of Persian origin;
{Biztha} a eunuch of Xerxes: - Biztha.

item.title: בּחון
item.description: From H974; an assayer of metals: - tower.

item.title: בּחר בּחוּר
item.description: Participle passive of H977; properly {selected} that {is} a youth (often collectively): - (choice) young ({man}) {chosen} X hole.

item.title: בּחיןo
item.description: Another form of H975; a watch tower of besiegers: - tower.

item.title: בּחיר
item.description: From H977; select: - {choose} chosen {one} elect.

item.title: בּחל
item.description: A primitive root; to loathe. For H926: - {abhor} get hastily [from the margin for H926].

item.title: בּחן
item.description: A primitive root; to test (especially metals); generally and figuratively to investigate: - {examine} {prove} {tempt} try (trial).

item.title: בּחן
item.description: From H974 (in the sense of keeping a lookout); a watch tower: - tower.

item.title: בּחן
item.description: From H974; trial: - tried.

item.title: בּחר
item.description: A primitive root; properly to {try} that {is} (by implication) select: - {acceptable} {appoint} choose ({choice}) {excellent} {join} be {rather} require.

item.title: בּחרוּמי
item.description: Patrial from H980 (by transposition) a Bacharumite or inhabitant of Bachurim: - Baharumite.

item.title: בּחרים בּחוּרות בּחרות
item.description:
Feminine plural of H970; also (masculine plural);
youth (collectively and abstractly): - young {men} youth.

item.title: בּחוּרים בּחרים
item.description:
Masculine plural of H970; young men;
{Bachurim} a place in Palestine: - Bahurim.

item.title: בּטה בּטא
item.description: A primitive root; to babble; hence to vociferate angrily: - {pronounce} speak (unadvisedly).

item.title: בּטח
item.description: A primitive root; properly to hie for refuge (but not so precipitately as H2620); figuratively to {trust} be confident or sure: - be bold ({confident} {secure} {sure}) careless ({one} {woman}) put {confidence} (make to) {hope} ({put} make to) trust.

item.title: בּטח
item.description: From H982; properly a place of refuge; abstractly {safety} both the fact (security) and the feeling (trust); often (adverbially with or without preposition) safely: - {assurance} {boldly} (without) care ({-less}) {confidence} {hope} safe ({-ly} {-ty}) {secure} surely.

item.title: בּטח
item.description: The same as H983; {Betach} a place in Syria: - Betah.

item.title: בּטחה
item.description: Feminine of H984; trust: - confidence.

item.title: בּטּחון
item.description: From H982; trust: - {confidence} hope.

item.title: בּטּחות
item.description: Feminine plural from H982; security: - secure.

item.title: בּטל
item.description: A primitive root; to desist from labor: - cease.

item.title: בּטל
item.description: (Chaldee); corresponding to H988; to stop: - ({cause} make {to}) {cease} hinder.

item.title: בּטן
item.description: From an unused root probably meaning to be hollow; the {belly} especially the womb; also the bosom or body of anything: - {belly} {body} + as they be {born} + {within} womb.

item.title: בּטן
item.description: The same as H990; {Beten} a place in Palestine: - Beten.

item.title: בּטן
item.description: From H990; (only in plural) a pistachio nut (from its form): - nut.

item.title: בּטנים
item.description:
Probably plural from H992; hollows;
{Betonim} a place in Palestine: - Betonim.

item.title: בּי
בּין
item.description: A primitive root; to separate mentally (or {distinguish}) that {is} (generally) understand: - {attend} {consider} be {cunning} {diligently} {direct} {discern} {eloquent} {feel} {inform} {instruct} have {intelligence} {know} look well {to} {mark} {perceive} be {prudent} {regard} (can) skill ({-ful}) {teach} {think} ({cause} make {to} {get} {give} have) understand ({-ing}) {view} (deal) wise ({-ly} man).

item.title: בּין
item.description: (Sometimes in the plural masculine or feminine); properly the constructively contracted form of an otherwise unused noun from H995; a distinction; but used only as a {preposition} between (repeated before each {noun} often with other particles); also as a {conjugation} either... or: - {among} {asunder} {at} between (-twixt . . . {and}) + from (the {widest}) X {in} out {of} whether (it be... {or}) within.

item.title: בּין
item.description: (Chaldee); corresponding to H996: - {among} between.

item.title: בּינה
item.description: From H995; understanding: - {knowledge} {meaning} X {perfectly} {understanding} wisdom.

item.title: בּינה
item.description: (Chaldee); corresponding to H998: - knowledge.

item.title: בּיצה
item.description: From the same as H948; an egg (from its whiteness): - egg.
